title: 820-5509-A -  Mac Mini 2014, with corrupted SPI Rom.
message: clover was used, and has corrupted the the SPI rom. Duke can you able to fix if i give you the corrupted rom, then copy the ME region over to a good rom??

title: 820-5509-A -  Mac Mini 2014, with corrupted SPI Rom.
message:
since Duke is away, i better do this on my own.


is this correct way of copying ME region using the HxD Editor app?

1. ) Open original ROM file
2. ) search for KRID, put my cursor just after all the FFF's end. so beginning of 20 20
3. ) Menu bar > Click "Edit" and click "Select Block"
4. ) in the length field type: 17D000
5. ) in the Menu bar > click "Copy
6. ) Open New rom File that you downloaded from google
7. ) Search KRID, put my cursor just after all the FFF's end. so beginning of 20 20
8. ) Menu bar > Click "Edit" and click "Select Block"
9. ) in the length field type: 17D000
10. ) in the Menu bar > click "Paste write"
11. ) Save


got the tutorial here, start at 1:28:06

[URL]https://youtu.be/rvrCSntnhyM?t=5286[/URL]

title: 820-5509-A -  Mac Mini 2014, with corrupted SPI Rom.
message:
it worked, boot to OSX but....
it turns on by itself soon as i plug the power cord, also turn on after i put to shutdown.

did i do something incorrectly??

title: 820-5509-A -  Mac Mini 2014, with corrupted SPI Rom.
message:
ok, i took it apart and reassemble again, then did a PRAM reset. it seems to did the job and no more auto turn on.

i then run ASD, no error found.

so its a success?

[IMG type="full" width="200px"]https://i.imgur.com/FbaoLUO.jpg[/IMG]
